title: SRPC right, rising inflation and unemployment

content.question: An increase in both the inflation rate and the unemployment rate can be illustrated by

choices.label: a movement along the short-run Phillips curve
a rightward shift of the short-run Phillips curve
a leftward shift of the short-run Phillips curve
a rightward shift of the aggregate demand curve
a leftward shift of the aggregate demand curve

content.answer: a rightward shift of the short-run Phillips curve
